availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Seldom F. Bowman (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and Captain (U.S.A.))

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Son of Sarah Bowman. Married to Lizzy F. Finney Bowman in Madison County, Kentucky on February 16, 1858. Farmer in Estill County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Estill County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in Fourteenth Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as Captain from August 21, 1862 to September 16, 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 210.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 208.Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 377. Find A Grave, "Seldom Fletcher Bowman (July 30, 1822-December 30, 1891)," Memorial #126129746, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/126129746 (accessed August 16, 2019). Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183302, p. 138. KYR-0003-101-0007.
